tweets.text: Watch @blumhouse #NannyFilm, written and directed by @NotNikyatu, cinematography by @The_RinaYang. The film follows an African woman, who hopes her job as a nanny will help bring her young son to the U.S. However, a violent presence threatens to destroy everything. #WIFWednesday https://t.co/BUTR8FmsRn

Bejeweled video is out NOW! Directed by this tired tacky wench. Got to make this with my best friends @HAIMtheband, greatest of greats @LauraDern, icon of burlesque and glamour @DitaVonTeese, genius and actual dame @patmcgrathreal and my partner in Midnights mayhem @jackantonoff. https://t.co/RO8jA3csYW

with some help from the excellent @birbigs, @bejohnce, and @meellisday who fabulously portray… get ready for it… my grown sons and daughter in law? Anyway. Forever grateful to my incredible DP @The_RinaYang and our amazing crew. 🌌🤩

urls.title: Cinematographer Rina Yang Talks ‘Euphoria’, ’Nanny,' and Working with FKA Twigs
urls.description: A conversation with the Taylor Swift and Dua Lipa-approved director of photography.

tweets.text: Cinematographer @The_RinaYang has worked with everyone from #TaylorSwift and #DuaLipa to #SamLevinson and #FKATwigs. Here, she discusses her latest project, the horror film ‘Nanny,’ and what makes a truly great director. https://t.co/QODchGOLnN

On the red carpet at the London Film Festival with our #NannyFilm creative team! So much to celebrate, so much to adore! Truly a night to remember for all of us. 💕 #wcw #LFF 

@MameAnnaDiop @NotNikyatu #NikkiaMoulterie @The_RinaYang @Zephanii https://t.co/3pqp1906xA

Honored to create again with @fkatwigs for the new fragrance by Viktor & Rolf "Good Fortune" with creative direction by the legendary @inezandvinoodh & cinematography by @The_RinaYang 🌹🌹🌹 #fkatwigs https://t.co/9mdd9YqWpz
on the next #EUPHORIA... https://t.co/dJq5nJRpER
🏆 U.S. Grand Jury Prize: Dramatic goes to NANNY, directed by Nikyatu Jusu (@NotNikyatu). #sundance https://t.co/Ynh7QthWoW

urls.title: Taylor Swift - All Too Well: The Short Film
urls.description: Written & Directed by: Taylor SwiftStarring: Sadie Sink, Dylan O’Brien & Taylor SwiftRed (Taylor’s Version) available everywhere now: https://taylor.lnk.to/r...

tweets.text:
“All Too Well” @taylorswift13

Director: @taylorswift13
DP: @the_rinayang
Producer/EP: @saulfilm

Watch: https://t.co/CJZgaWmOo7 
#ShotOnFilm #35mm https://t.co/jrgU9EIssL

Nikyatu Jusu’s NANNY… wow. An unreal Anna Diop, lush cinematography by Rina Yang, and devastating use of folktales by Jusu. Such a smart film about the exploitation of African immigrant mothers. People need to see this movie, and do the work it demands. It’s worth it. #sundance https://t.co/m05CYon6m1
Had to pause in the middle of NANNY to look up the cinematographer. Rina Yang (@The_RinaYang) …wooowwww! 😍 More thoughts on the film to come. #Sundance2022 https://t.co/FhOFlol3EN

“Bradford wanted the everyday life section to be quite mundane and like a documentary in its style, whereas the athletic sequences would have a punchier visual language."
- @The_RinaYang on working with Bradford Young ASC on @Channel4's 'Super. Human.' ad. https://t.co/wqg2N7wex3

urls.title: Rina Yang on shooting Taylor Swift's All Too Well: The Short Film
urls.description: Rina Yang filled us in on what it was like to work with one of the most recognisable songwriters on the planet: Taylor Swift.

tweets.text:
"We always thought that the kitchen scene felt like a handheld scene...It’s one of my favourite scenes, and I absolutely love that @taylorswift13 decided not to cut away, it’s much more powerful that way."
- DP @The_RinaYang on shooting 'All Too Well'
https://t.co/E8bLyil4Rb

urls.title: Taylor Swift - All Too Well: The Short Film
urls.description: Go to Taylor Swift - All Too Well: The Short Film.

tweets.text:
Shot on 35mm film with cinematography by the brilliant @the_rinayang. Plan your watch parties or grab your blanket and curl up into a ball. However you want to watch All Too Well The Short Film, it’ll be out tomorrow on YouTube at 7pm Eastern. 🥲 

https://t.co/YzOtPK5Hzd https://t.co/SWAlziJ6bC

Congratulations once again @The_RinaYang ‘Sitting in Limbo’ has just won Best Single Drama at the @BAFTA Tv Awards! 👏🥳👏
Rina a DOP based in London, was selected as a breakthrough in 2020, she is also the first female DOP to win a cinematography award at the British Arrows. https://t.co/IWGCSgyprb
The team behind Sitting in Limbo, tonight’s winner in the Single Drama category, dedicate the award to all the victims of the Windrush scandal. #VirginMediaBAFTAs #BAFTATV https://t.co/7z7ShPEruE

Exactly one year ago today, I arrived in my grandmother’s hometown, Changchun, to start prep for THE FAREWELL. I kept saying, “it doesn’t feel real.” Today, we have a trailer...and I still pinch myself.  On July 12th, we’re coming to a theater near you. #thefarewell @a24 https://t.co/4DaiOwHD1Z

So proud of what we've created! Welcome to the new cast of TOP BOY. I hope you're ready... only on NETFLIX this Autumn. @TheRealKano @onlymikes_ @LittleSimz @Santandave1 @Drake @topboynetflix #alwayswinning #topboy #topboynetflix https://t.co/LKdSGHMHLD

Congratulations to Monika Lenczewska & Rina Yang on their wins at British Arrows 2019. In 44 years of British Arrows, no female Cinematographer has won. 2019 changes that, not one win but two! #cinematography #filmcommunity #dop #filmlife #talent  #storytelling #innovative https://t.co/HieN7K9bnC

Huge congratulations to #illuminatrix #DoP Rina Yang on her Silver Award for Best #Cinematography at the @britisharrows for her work on Nike spot, Just Do It: Caster Semenya. This is the first year a woman has won this prize! #nike @Nike @The_RinaYang 🎉🎥💫 https://t.co/smL7yVwiu2

2019 BRITISH ARROWS WINNERS:
RINA YANG is a SILVER WINNER of British Arrows award for cinematography
Nike, Just Do It: Caster Semenya, made for Wieden+Kennedy Amsterdam by Park Pictures, directed by AG Rojas
https://t.co/8vuyEhR4oY

What an honor! #BohemianRhapsody has been nominated for 5 @TheAcademy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Actor in a Leading Role. #OscarNoms https://t.co/F3UrfWEIpm
So excited to be part of this https://t.co/y05o5b6V5P

One of the most exciting cinematographers working today, Yang's visual style is instantly recognisable. Join us for ALL THE COLORS OF THE DARK: THE WORK OF @The_RinaYang on Sat 17th Nov, 5pm, @RichMixLondon 
https://t.co/Cad4QcAvl6 https://t.co/G9hKyyTxeI

& there's the toxic assumption that to write, you must suffer. to write greatly, you must suffer greatly. cinematically, if possible. & as though depth of suffering = depth of authenticity. another issue: writers of color must produce "authentic" accounts of being oh so different
